text: The 2004 Taça de Angola was the 23rd edition of the Taça de Angola, the second most important and the top knock-out football club competition following the Girabola. Sonangol do Namibe beat Primeiro de Agosto 2-0 in the final to secure its second title. The winner qualified to the 2005 CAF Confederation Cup. ==Stadia and locations== {|class="wikitable sortable" !
